title.narrative: F.a: Trade Union Structures and Collective Bargaining in Ports

description.narrative: The project improves the defense of interests of the port workers by strengthening their trade unions in Colombia. This includes research, capacity building, communication, networking and organizational development. The main problems port workers face are related to weak or even non-existent interest representation which has its roots in the weakness or lack of trade unions in the sector. The project intends to strengthen sector's trade unions and their capacity to collective bargaining and negotiation with employers, to improve the working conditions and to defend workers' rights. As a result of the project, the unions of port workers are better equipped to negotiate decent work conditions, unions are stronger and are able to represent workers, and unions a ct more efficiently and transparently. The beneficiaries of the project are port workers in Colombia and their trade unions. The project is implemented by International Transport Workers' Federation (ITF) and its member union in Colombia (SNTT). The suppor t and international experience of ITF is a key issue in strengthening of the local unions.
